# Zajecia 2, zadanie 1
## Zadanie 1
```{r}
punkt <- st_point(c(18, 50)) %>% st_sfc(crs = 
st_crs(world)) %>% st_sf()
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = world) + 
  geom_sf(data = punkt, size = 4, col = 'red') + 
  theme_light()
```
